summary: Root cause identified: combination of Claude Code MCP timeout gaps (issue #15945) and lean-lsp-mcp diagnostic processing delays on files with compilation errors. Project already has key mitigations in place (direct execution, early metadata). Main recommendation is to fix SoundnessLemmas.lean errors and pre-build before diagnostics.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting 4 Claude Code issues, 2 lean-lsp-mcp issues, file-specific analysis, and recommendations

next_steps: Run /plan 718 to create implementation plan for recommended actions
